effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 884,398 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 340,804.
Set: Divine Toll applies Insurance! to allies it heals for 8 sec. Divine Toll's cooldown is reduced by 1.0 sec each time you spend Holy Power.

name: Faded Championship Ring
description: 'I got one more in me' - Unknown

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Use: Draw out a piece of the target's soul, decreasing their movement speed by 30% until the soul reaches you. The soul instantly heals you for 691,560, and grants you up to 11,437 Critical Strike for 16 sec. You gain more Critical Strike from lower health targets. (2 Min Cooldown)

Equip: Your healing spells and abilities have a chance to summon Mister Pick-Me-Up for 6 sec, firing a healing beam every 2 sec that jumps between 5 injured allies to restore 103,924 health each.

Overhealing from this effect irradiates allies to deal Nature damage to nearby enemies over 1.5 sec, increased by additional overhealing.
Equip: Your gear warms with Woven Dawnthread and gains 756 Critical Strike when over 80% health.

name: Tabard of the Lightbringer

spells.description: Use: Suffuses the wearer with the Light. (30 Min Cooldown)

description: May you always bring light into dark places.
